title: Early jg clear slow as hell
body:
Having an early jg impact is difficult.

Much rage to jg these last few days.

replies.body:
{{champion:203}}  {{champion:107}}  {{champion:72}}  <- these can clear pretty easy.
Maybe you've just got the wrong masteries? :'D
Quite possible. What are you running?
{{item:1400}} swap with {{item:3142}} after you have got all els
He's not my main but i am tempted to give him a run

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E8Eco5Qi,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-11-13T00:00:56.530+0000)
>
> He's not my main but i am tempted to give him a run

Who do you main? What champ are you struggling to clear with?

I meant main adc (siv / ashe main).

But my jg clear with rango sucks balls - still relatively new to him but was having good success in normals so i brought to ranked. Xin i am not too bad with but deffo noticed a slowdown in clear speed and takes a lot longer to make an impact.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E8Eco5Qi,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-13T00:34:12.059+0000)
>
> I meant main adc (siv / ashe main).
> 
> But my jg clear with rango sucks balls - still relatively new to him but was having good success in normals so i brought to ranked. Xin i am not too bad with but deffo noticed a slowdown in clear speed and takes a lot longer to make an impact.

I see.

I haven't tried either of those in the jungle as yet so I'm unable to give you appropriate feed back. I will try to give them a go today / tomorrow and if i remember come back and let you know my thoughts if you like.

Would appreciate that thanks very much. 

Probably just preseason jitters but would be interested to see what you think.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E8Eco5Qi,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-13T00:39:57.816+0000)
>
> Would appreciate that thanks very much. 
> 
> Probably just preseason jitters but would be interested to see what you think.

Probs easier to add me in game. We could even play a norm together or something which would make it easier to display / communicate etc.
I have been playing a lot of champs in the jg some like {{champion:3}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:90}} for the lols and can do a full clear with no leash
really? I've been getting thoroughly ruined. Cant do a full clear without backing at least once. Probably just need to get used to the new items and masteries but struggling so far.
